props.name: returnFocusRef
props.description: Ref for the element to focus when the `Overlay` is closed.

props.name: onClickOutside
props.description: Function to call when clicking outside of the `Overlay`. Typically this function sets the `Overlay` visibility state to `false`.

props.name: onEscape
props.description: Function to call when user presses `Escape`. Typically this function sets the `Overlay` visibility state to `false`.

props.name: ignoreClickRefs
props.description: An array of ref objects to ignore clicks on in the onOutsideClick behavior. This is often used to ignore clicking on the element that toggles the open/closed state for the Overlay to prevent the Overlay from being toggled twice.

props.name: initialFocusRef
props.description: Ref for the element to focus when the `Overlay` is opened. If nothing is provided, the first focusable element in the `Overlay` body is focused.

props.name: width
props.description: Sets the width of the `Overlay`, pick from our set list of widths, or pass `auto` to automatically set the width based on the content of the `Overlay`. `small` corresponds to `256px`, `medium` corresponds to `320px`, `large` corresponds to `480px`, `xlarge` corresponds to `640px`, `xxlarge` corresponds to `960px`.

props.name: height
props.description: Sets the height of the `Overlay`, pick from our set list of heights, or pass `auto` to automatically set the height based on the content of the `Overlay`. `xsmall` corresponds to `192px`, `small` corresponds to `256px`, `medium` corresponds to `320px`, `large` corresponds to `432px`, `xlarge` corresponds to `600px`.

props.name: maxHeight
props.description: Sets the maximum height of the `Overlay`, pick from our set list of heights. `xsmall` corresponds to `192px`, `small` corresponds to `256px`, `medium` corresponds to `320px`, `large` corresponds to `432px`, `xlarge` corresponds to `600px`.

props.name: maxWidth
props.description: Sets the maximum width of the `Overlay`, pick from our set list of widths. `small` corresponds to `256px`, `medium` corresponds to `320px`, `large` corresponds to `480px`, `xlarge` corresponds to `640px`, `xxlarge` corresponds to `960px`.

props.name: visibility
props.description: Sets the visibility of the `Overlay`.

props.name: anchorSide
props.description: If provided, the Overlay will slide into position from the side of the anchor with a brief animation

props.name: top
props.description: The top CSS property of the Overlay — affects the vertical position.

props.name: left
props.description: The left CSS property of the Overlay — affects the horizontal position.

props.name: right
props.description: The right CSS property of the Overlay — affects the horizontal position.

props.name: bottom
props.description: The bottom CSS property of the Overlay — affects the vertical position.

props.name: position
props.description: The position CSS property of the Overlay — sets how the Overlay is positioned relative to its Portal

props.name: portalContainerName
props.description: If defined, Overlays will be rendered in the named portal. See also `Portal`.

props.name: preventOverflow
props.description:
Determines if the Overlay width should be adjusted responsively if `width` is set to either `auto`, `medium` or lower and there is not enough space to display the Overlay.
If `preventOverflow` is set to `false`, the Overlay will be displayed at the maximum width that fits within the viewport.

props.name: role
props.type: ARIA role - will most often be 'dialog' or 'menu'
props.description: ARIA role to use for the overlay

props.name: responsiveVariant
props.description: Optional prop to set responsive variant for narrow screen sizes
